name: atlas-cmms
description: CMMS is a web-based maintenance management system for tracking equipment, tasks, and service reports. Designed for small businesses and self-hosted setups.
features: Maintenance Management: Track equipment maintenance and service schedules. Prevent downtime.
Task Tracking: Assign and monitor maintenance tasks. Stay organized.
Equipment Database: Catalog all assets and their maintenance history. Complete records.
Service Reports: Generate detailed maintenance reports. Document everything.
Work Orders: Create and manage maintenance work orders. Streamlined operations.
Small Business Focus: Designed for small to medium operations. Affordable solution.
Self-Hosted: Keep maintenance data on your own infrastructure. Data ownership.
Web-Based: Access from any device with a browser. Manage anywhere.
